item.title: DS Section Nav
item.description: The List Here is a list of my articles in the order I would present the concepts in an intro course: Data Literacy - Discussing aspects of data and digital information in general. Visualizing Data - How to convey the information you have. For a chronological list of all the data science articles, go here.
